page.description: Create a crlf() delimited list of installed SQL Syntaxes.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::ListSyntaxes() Syntax Syntax_List as C = .ListSyntaxes() ArgumentDescription Syntax_ListA list of installed SQL Syntaxes. A SQL::Connection object.
Description The ListSyntaxes() method returns a CR-LF delimited list of installed SQL Syntaxes. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if ui_msg_box("Syntaxes", conn.ListSyntaxes()) conn.close()
See Also SQL::Connection Object
